title: Coronation Street: Bernie attacks Kel after discovering paedophile pictures
text:
If anyone has been affected by the issues raised on the programme, call - Helpline: 0808 802 9999 (12-2.30 & 7-9.30) or visit rapecrisis.org.uk

There have been reports that Bernie (Jane Hazlegrove) is set to murder Kel (Joe Alessi) after discovering sick paedophile pictures which prove he abused her son Paul as a child.

And in new stills from an upcoming episode, Bernie can be seen attacking him after spotting him working as a security guard in the shopping mall.

However, Kel fights back and Chesney (Sam Aston) is forced to intervene and suvsequently brings him falling down to the ground.

Coronation Street SPOILER: Bernie is set to attack Kel after discovering sick paedophile pictures which prove he abused her son Paul as a child

(Corrie) Street Fight: A scuffle ensues and Chesney steps in to help as Kel fights Bernie back

The attack comes after Bernie first refuses to believe her son when he tells her Kel groomed him when he was younger.

The Sun reports: 'After Bernie finds evidence that Kel has lied to her, she vows to exact revenge.

A source told the site: 'All hell will break loose when Bernie finds out the truth that Kel did abuse Paul.

Shouting: No doubt it's a devastating time for Bernie after she discovers the truth

Hero of the hour: Chesney proves to the her knight in shining armour as he wades in to help

Holding her own: But Bernie certainly lays into Kel as her devastation for her son mounts

'With Paul's words ringing in her ears she starts to search for anything that will put her mind at rest and discovers a box of pictures that Kel took of Paul.

'Bernie realises immediately Paul was telling the truth and she flies into a fury.'

'She goes into a violent rage and tries to kill Kel by beating him up with a stool for what he has done to her son and family.'

Something to say: It looks as though she also graffitis a picture of Kel on the shopping mall wall

It looks as though things definitely don't end well for Kel who Joe recently revealed is soon to be leaving the soap.

Actor Joe, who plays him, hinted that he will meet a sticky end as he recently spoke to Lorraine Kelly about his role.

He said: 'It is finite and I’ll never be a regular on Coronation Street.'

Meanwhile, Chesney is really going through the mill on the programme as his ex, Sinead (Katie McGlynn) is soon to lose her battle with cancer.

Coming to an end: Joe Alessi, who plays Kel recently told Lorraine that his role on the show is 'finite' but will Bernie murder him as predicted?

He said: 'It is finite and I’ll never be a regular on Coronation Street'
